About Me

I am a Web Developer and entrepreneur with a wide range of work experience from agriculture, the military, oil & gas, sales, and construction to now focusing on a career in coding. I grew up in rural South Texas and became a Machine Gunner in the Marine Corps immediately following high school, after 2 deployments overseas I left the military with an honorable discharge and began working in the oilfield and experienced many years of the ups and downs of that industry mixed with attending college and relocating several times across the state for work. When I decided on a career change I began working on construction projects around the San Antonio area while honing my abilities as a developer. During this time I was offered and accepted a postion as the Operations Manager for an exotic vehicle importer in San Antonio and continued in that capcity for aprroximately a year before deciding to focus full time on software development.

Projects

PennyBroker

PennyBroker

PennyBroker was a collaborative project between Joseph Martin (josephmartin721) and Hagen Derouen (hagenderouen) and myself to build a web application dedicated to the specifcally to the OTC market. It is still a work in progress with the biggest obstacle being financial constraints of using stock market APIâ€™s.

Express-Retail

Express-Retail

Express-Retail is a backend project that utilizes mysql, dotenv, express, and sequelize to build a product database to be utilized by management personnel for retail merchandisers. Application is started by using the 'node server.js' command to begin listening on port 3001. Requests were tested through Postman.
